verbose_text: Taken together, the double homozygotes do not show a bias toward left sided expression (1/19), as do the Tbx6 homozygous mutants that show sporadic Pitx2 expression (8/8), leading to the conclusion that the effect of Tbx6 on left biased expression of Pitx2 is hypostatic to the effect of Pkd2, as would be expected on the basis of the generally accepted pathway for detection of the nodal flow.
